post.description:
Creates a template by selected usage type. Returns response. If the template is created successfully, link to
Template Wizard Step 1 is stored in the HTTP header "Location". If the creation fails, an error message is stored
in the response body.

parameters.name: body

schema.description:
Contains the usage type of the template. If the selected usage type is equal to 0, an INDD template is
created. If the selected usage type is equal to 2, a HTML template is created.
